GroundTravelEmssnFctr.name: GroundTravelEmssnFctr
GroundTravelEmssnFctr.description: Represents the emissions factors for scope 3 ground travel.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency in which the expense was made.

DistanceUnit.description: The unit of measure for the distance.

EmissionFactorDataSource.description: The source of the emissions factor reference data.

EmissionFactorUpdateYear.description: The year in which this reference data for the emissions factor was most recently updated.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the emissions factor.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PersCarEmssnInKgCh4DstnUnit.description: The CH4 emissions for personal cars that are calculated for this energy use record.

PersCarEmssnInKgCo2DstnUnit.description: The CO2 emissions for personal cars that are calculated for this energy use record.

PersCarEmssnInKgCo2eDstnUnit.description: The conversion factor that's used to calculate the emissions from a personal car.

PersCarEmssnInKgN2oDstnUnit.description: The N2O emissions for personal cars that are calculated for this energy use record.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the emissions factor record can be locked from dataset updates.

TaxiEmssnInKgCh4DstnUnit.description: The CH4 emissions for taxis that are calculated for this energy use record.

TaxiEmssnInKgCo2DstnUnit.description: The CO2 emissions for taxis that are calculated for this energy use record.

TaxiEmssnInKgCo2eDstnUnit.description: The conversion factor that's used to calculate the emissions from a taxi and limousine.

TaxiEmssnInKgN2oDstnUnit.description: The N2O emissions for taxis that are calculated for this energy use record.

TaxiRateForDstnUnit.description: The rate value that's used to convert the taxi expense cost to distance.

TrainEmssnInKgCh4DstnUnit.description: The CH4 emissions for trains that are calculated for this energy use record.

TrainEmssnInKgCo2DstnUnit.description: The CO2 emissions for trains that are calculated for this energy use record.

TrainEmssnInKgCo2eDstnUnit.description: The conversion factor that's used to calculate the emissions from train travel.

TrainEmssnInKgN2oDstnUnit.description: The N2O emissions for trains that are calculated for this energy use record.

TrainRateForDstnUnit.description: The rate that's used to convert train expense cost to distance.
